listEntitlementsFor

public static java.util.List<OrgEntitlementDto> listEntitlementsFor(Org org)
Returns a list of entitlement dtos for a given org .. Basically collects a list of all entitlements and provides a DTO with information abt the entitlements (like current members, available members etc.)

Parameters:
org - the org to lookup on
Returns:
List of dtos for all entitlements.
